text: Arima Subdistrict () is a subdistrict of al-Bab District in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Administrative centre is Arima. At the 2004 census, the subdistrict had a population of 32,041. ==Cities, towns and villages== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- |+ Cities, towns and villages of Arima Subdistrict !
